title: Copper Milberry scrap Import
selftext:
Hello everyone 
I am Krushang Gupta from Green Lotus Media Agency , Mumbai , India 

We are a company which works on commission basis in the metal scrap market

Today i have reached out for 2 things

2 - I have a deal in copper milberry scrap which involves import , if you have any buyers in India who want to buy it the details will be in the given presentation below
